name: doubter
description: No-hassle runtime type validation and parsing.

scripts.build: tsc --project ./tsconfig.build.json && rollup --external tslib --input ./lib/index.js --file ./lib/index-cjs.js --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve && npm run build:terser
scripts.build:terser: TEMP=$(mktemp) && rm $TEMP && for FILE in $(find ./lib -name '*.js'); do terser --name-cache $TEMP --compress --mangle toplevel --output $FILE -- $FILE; done && rm $TEMP || exit 1
